Content: So who wants to bet that (if they exhume) the founder of Quadriga CX isn't in his grave?   How morbid. Content:
On second thought, Cotten seems as shady as they come, faking his own death doesn't seem far fetched to me.  Not after reading about 200 millions in unsubstantiated deposits that he wrote into existence under his pseudonymous Chris Markay accounts. Unbelievable.   See  p35
